sentences.english: rests in his beauty on the water, and the great heron feeds.
sentences.chinese: 美丽的野鸭在湖中安憩，巨大的鹭鸶在觅食。

sentences.english: Young snowy egret chicks battle to feed on the recently caught catch.
sentences.chinese: 年轻白鹭鸶的小鸡为了最近捕获的饲料而战斗着。

sentences.english: the stork, any kind of heron, the hoopoe and the bat.
sentences.chinese: 鹳，鹭鸶与其类，戴胜与蝙蝠。

sentences.english: Karyotype study on Chlorophytum malayense and Diuranthera major.
sentences.chinese: 大叶吊兰和鹭鸶兰的核型研究。

sentences.english: There were many things Ruthie could have been if she wanted to.
sentences.chinese: 如果她想的话，鹭鸶儿本来可以成为很多种人的。

definition: (bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
